Package Junit_SuYeounLee

Class YourPurchases

java.lang.Object
Junit_SuYeounLee.YourPurchases
public class YourPurchases extends Object
You were at Walmart near your home to make some purchases last weekend. You had so much coins including nickels, dimes, etc and wanted to just use them all for your purchases. A cash register sums up the sales and then computes the change due to you.
